description: This file serves as an initializer for the puzzle engine modules in a word guessing game platform. It provides exports for engine classes, a registry utility, and hint helper functions, organizing related components and making them accessible for external use.

classes.name: ClassicEngine
classes.description: An engine class for classic word puzzles.

classes.name: AnagramEngine
classes.description: An engine class for anagram puzzles.

methods.name: get_engine
methods.description: Function to retrieve a puzzle engine instance from the registry.

methods.name: reveal_position
methods.description: Utility to reveal a specific position in a puzzle hint.

methods.name: reveal_first_letter
methods.description: Utility to reveal the first letter of a puzzle word.
